plugins.name: JumpMark (Jump Between Marked Figma Components Instantly)
plugins.description:
JumpMark transforms the way you navigate through complex Figma files. This powerful plugin lets you create smart bookmarks for your most-used components, layers, and sections, enabling instant navigation with smooth animations.


üé• Watch Tutorial | üì± Follow Us


Key Features:

  1. Smart Bookmark Groups: Organize your bookmarks into custom groups for different project sections, components, or workflows
  2. One-Click Navigation: Jump between bookmarked locations instantly with beautiful smooth animations
  3. Visual Labeling: Color-code your bookmarks and groups for quick visual recognition
  4. Notes & Documentation: Add helpful notes to bookmarks for team collaboration
  5. Drag & Drop Organization: Easily reorder bookmarks within groups
  6. Search Functionality: Quickly find any bookmark or group using the search feature
  7. Custom Animation Settings: Adjust transition speed and style for comfortable navigation


Perfect For:

  1. UX/UI designers working with large design systems
  2. Design teams collaborating on complex projects
  3. Product designers managing multiple component states
  4. Anyone working with extensive Figma files


How It Works:

  1. Select any elements you want to bookmark
  2. Create a group to organize related bookmarks
  3. Add bookmarks with optional notes and color labels
  4. Navigate instantly between locations with a single click


Free Trial Available:

Try all premium features free for 3 hours. Experience smoother Figma navigation and boost your workflow efficiency.

Transform your Figma navigation experience with JumpMark - the smart bookmarking solution for professional designers.

  2. Join our newsletter for design tips & updates
  3. Be part of our growing design community

plugins.name: Mailman for Klaviyo
plugins.description:
Streamline your email design workflow by seamlessly exporting Figma designs to Klaviyo. Perfect for agencies and brands managing multiple Klaviyo accounts. Key features:


  1. Direct export from Figma to Klaviyo with preserved design fidelity
  2. Support for multiple Klaviyo account management
  3. Save and reuse HTML templates and blocks
  4. Time-saving workflow for agencies and marketing teams


Whether you're an agency handling multiple client accounts or a brand maintaining email templates, this plugin bridges the gap between Figma design and Klaviyo implementation. Save time on manual exports and focus on creating emails.

plugins.name: Text Color Pairs To Variables
plugins.description:
Usage

  1. Create a frame with any name.
  2. Inside the frame created in step 1, create another frame named variableColorItem.
  3. Inside variableColorItem, create a frame named variableColor.
  4. Set a fill color for variableColor.
  5. Within variableColorItem, create a text layer named variableName.
  6. Select the frame you created in step 1.
  7. Launch the plugin.
  8. Click the button.
  9. The color of variableColor will be registered as a local variable under the name variableName.
plugins.tagline: Generate variables from color and text combinations.

plugins.name: Geometric Tile Pattern SVG Generator
plugins.description:
Geometric Pattern Generator is a Figma plugin for creating beautiful, customizable geometric patterns. Built for designers who need professional-quality patterns fast, this plugin provides generation with granular control.


Key Features:


  1. Smart Generation: Instantly create unique patterns with randomized settings or manually adjust rows, columns, block size, colors, and big blocks chances
  2. Multiple Export Options: Download as PNG or SVG, or insert patterns directly into your Figma canvas as vector or raster graphics
  3. Developer-Friendly: View and copy HTML & CSS code, raw SVG markup, or URL-encoded versions for seamless web integration
  4. Smooth Workflow: Intuitive interface with real-time preview, smooth animations, and one-click generation


Perfect for creating backgrounds, textures, brand elements, or decorative graphics. Generate backgrounds for apps, websites, presentations, or print materials, get professional geometric patterns that would take hours to create manually ‚Äì in just seconds.

From concept to code, this plugin bridges the gap between design and development, making it essential for modern design workflows.

plugins.name: AdaptaFont‚ÄîIntelligent Font Scaling for Seamless Multi-Format Scenarios
plugins.description:
1. Text Font Size Adaptation for Different Image Dimension Requirements

Automatically adjusts text font size by modifying the fixed width and line count parameters according to different image dimension needs (e.g., designs for multiple e-commerce platforms), enabling rapid completion of typesetting in such scenarios.


2. Text Font Size Adaptation for Different Language Requirements

Through configuring font family, font weight, and line height settings, the plugin automatically adjusts font sizes for text content in various languages to adapt to the preset text width and line count, thereby quickly fulfilling typesetting requirements for globalized designs.


Features:


‚å®Ô∏è Methods to Obtain Text:

Designers can acquire text content requiring adaptive font sizes either by selecting text nodes or inputting/pasting new text in the plugin's input field.


üîÑ Reacquire Text Content & Text Properties:

Designers can click the refresh button to reacquire the text content, font, font weight, and line height of selected text layers on the canvas for further adjustments and optimization.


üëÄ Predict Actual Line Count:

The plugin features actual line count prediction capability, forecasting real line numbers based on current text content and settings to help designers better plan text layout.


‚ÜôÔ∏è Window Scaling:

The plugin window can be minimized by collapsing setting items, proving highly efficient in scenarios requiring rapid multi-language text replacement using identical text properties.


üé® Theme Switching & Language Toggling

Switch between light/dark themes

Instant Chinese/English interface language switching


---

plugins.name: flowwwww
plugins.description:
Streamline your workflows with flowwwww, the ultimate plugin for creating dynamic connectors between frames, components, and other objects in Figma. Whether you're designing user flows, wireframes, or complex diagrams, flowwwwwempowers you to create professional, customizable connections with ease.


Key Features

Intuitive Connector Creation

Select two frames or components, and flowwwww will instantly generate a connector between them.


Highly Customizable

Personalize your connectors with adjustable properties:

Stroke color and size.

Add text annotations to label your connectors for enhanced clarity.


Smart Obstacle Avoidance

Enable Obstacle Mode to automatically detect and avoid overlapping objects, ensuring clean and unobstructed connectors.

Perfect for complex designs where connectors need to navigate around other elements.



Use Cases

User Flows : Map out user journeys with clear, annotated connectors between screens.

Wireframing : Create structured layouts with precise connections between components.

Technical Diagrams : Build flowcharts, process maps, and other technical illustrations with ease.

Prototyping : Enhance your prototypes with interactive and visually appealing connectors.


How It Works

Install the flowwwww plugin from the Figma Community.

Select two frames, components, or rectangles that you want to connect.


Configure your connector settings (color, style, etc.) via the plugin interface.


Let flowwwww do the rest‚Äîwatch as it creates beautiful, dynamic connectors that adapt to your design.


Why Choose flowwwww?

flowwwww is more than just a connector tool‚Äîit‚Äôs a productivity booster for designers who value precision, flexibility, and efficiency. With its robust feature set and seamless integration into Figma, flowwwww is the go-to solution for anyone looking to elevate their design workflow.


Feedback and Support

We‚Äôre committed to making flowwwww the best it can be! If you have any suggestions, encounter issues, or simply love the plugin, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Leave a comment on the Figma Community page or reach out to us directly.


Get Started Today

Install flowwwww now and experience the power of effortless connector creation. Simplify your design process and bring your ideas to life with clarity and precision.
plugins.tagline: Effortless Connector Creation for Figma

plugins.name: RePic
plugins.description:
Smart Bulk Image Replacement for Figma

Boost your design workflow with bulk image replacement. Effortlessly swap images into your Figma projects with just a few clicks‚Äîselect your target images, pick replacements, and let RePic handle the rest. Perfect for updating mockups, prototypes, or templates, RePic auto-fills extra slots with a transparent placeholder and offers a "delete after replace" option for a clutter-free canvas.


How to Use RePic

  1. Select images (or their frame) to replace.
  2. Select replacement images next.
  3. Click Replace Images‚Äîdone!

Optional: Check "Delete after use"

plugins.name: Ai Design Review
plugins.description:
Transform Your Design Process with AI-powered Insights


Ai Design Review is a cutting-edge Figma plugin designed to help designers optimize their work by providing AI-driven design reviews. With this plugin, you can instantly analyze your designs and receive suggestions for improvement based on best practices in typography, layout, color schemes, accessibility, and overall visual consistency.


By utilizing AI technology, Ai Design Review helps you ensure that your designs adhere to industry standards, making your workflow more efficient and your designs more polished. The plugin automatically scans your design file, analyzes it against key design principles, and highlights potential issues, offering actionable insights and suggestions to improve the design's quality and user experience.


Whether you're a solo designer or part of a design team, Ai Design Review will serve as your AI assistant, providing real-time feedback to enhance your design‚Äôs impact and usability.


Key Features:

Automated Design Analysis: Instantly scan your designs for inconsistencies, color imbalances, accessibility issues, and more.


AI-Driven Recommendations: Receive intelligent suggestions for design improvements tailored to your project.


Customizable Feedback: Choose the types of design elements you want to receive feedback on, such as typography, spacing, or color.


Efficient Workflow: Save time and enhance collaboration by automatically detecting and fixing common design mistakes.


Boost your design efficiency and improve your work with Ai Design Review ‚Äî your AI-powered design assistant.
plugins.tagline: Enhance your designs with AI-powered insights for better quality and consistency

plugins.name: Modyo Figma Plugin
plugins.description:
The Modyo Figma Plugin is an essential tool for designers working within the Dynamic Framework. This plugin streamlines your design-to-development workflow with three core functionalities:


Export CSS as Variables: Seamlessly export your design elements as CSS variables tailored for the Dynamic Framework. This feature ensures consistency and speeds up the handoff process, making it easier for developers to implement designs directly from Figma.


Generate Color Palette: Effortlessly create and customize color palettes directly within Figma. This feature allows you to generate a range of colors that can be easily adjusted and applied across your design system, ensuring brand consistency and flexibility.


Font Size Generator Based on PX: Simplify your typography management with a font size generator that operates based on pixel values. This allows for easy creation of a typographic scale that aligns with your design requirements, ensuring responsive and visually appealing text styles.


The Modyo Figma Plugin is designed to empower designers and developers, making collaboration smoother and more efficient by providing a unified toolkit for creating consistent and high-quality UI components.
plugins.tagline: A plugin for Dynamic Framework

plugins.name: TRANS-AI
plugins.description:
TRANS-AI helps designers create multilingual designs by translating text layers and automatically adjusting layouts for right-to-left languages.


Key Features:

  1. Translate selected text layers using OpenAI, Anthropic, or Gemini API (bring your own API key)
  2. One-click layout conversion between RTL and LTR designs
  3. Option to automatically adjust layouts when translating to/from RTL languages
  4. Exclude specific layers from translation using the layer name filter
  5. Preserves text formatting while converting layouts


Perfect for teams creating multilingual products, localizing interfaces, or working with global audiences. TRANS-AI streamlines the localization workflow, saving designers hours of manual adjustments when adapting designs for different languages.
plugins.tagline: Go global in seconds! AI-powered translation with smart RTL/LTR layout conversion.

plugins.name: Frontify Template Checker
plugins.description:
This plugin checks your Figma designs and highlights potential issues before uploading them as templates into Frontify. It‚Äôs designed to improve your template creation and management experience ‚Äî making the integration between Figma and Frontify more seamless.


Issues

We‚Äôre continuously refining and expanding the list of checks. This initial release focuses on the most common issues, with more to come. As we improve template import capabilities, some checks may also be retired.


  1. Auto-layout frames
  2. Layers with multiple fills
  3. Frames with image fills
  4. Text case transformations
  5. Image filters
  6. Mixed text styles within a single text element
  7. Unsupported elements
  8. Empty pages
  9. Slice layers
  10. Flip transformations
  11. OpenType features
  12. Hanging punctuation


Support

If you come across issues not currently covered by the plugin, please contact your Customer Success Manager or email us at support@frontify.com.

plugins.name: Contrastio - Contrast & Accessibility Checker
plugins.description:
Contrastio helps you create more inclusive designs by automatically checking your work against WCAG accessibility guidelines.


üéØ Instant Accessibility Scanning

Check entire pages or specific frames with one click

Get real-time feedback on accessibility issues

Smart element exclusion with prefix system


üìä Comprehensive Checks

Color contrast validation (WCAG 2.0 & 2.1)

Typography accessibility analysis

Support for all compliance levels (A, AA, AAA)

Text readability assessment


üöÄ Designer-Friendly Workflow

One-click element highlighting

Clear violation explanations

Grouped similar issues for easy fixes


‚ö° Efficient & Fast

Scan thousands of elements in seconds

Stay in your design flow

No external tools needed


Why Contrastio?

Whether you're designing for government websites, enterprise applications, or simply want to create more inclusive designs, Contrastio helps ensure your work meets accessibility standards from the start.


Free Version Includes:

Up to 2,000 node scans per month


Pro Version ($4.99) Adds:

Unlimited node scanning

All new features coming along like reporting, screen/color modes.

plugins.name: C2O - Clutter to Organised
plugins.description:
C2O (Clutter to Organized) is a simple and effective Figma plugin that helps designers automatically arrange frames into a structured layout. If your Figma file feels cluttered, C2O will neatly organize everything in just one click.


‚ú® How It Works:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Rename your frames with a prefix inside square brackets.

Example:

[1a] Login Page (Row 1, Frame A)

[1b] Password Entry (Row 1, Frame B)

[2a] Dashboard (Row 2, Frame A)

2Ô∏è‚É£ Run the plugin and click "Organize Frames".

3Ô∏è‚É£ Your frames will be arranged into clearly structured groups, placed in order from top to bottom.

Frames without the naming pattern will be placed in an "Others" group at the bottom.


üí° Why Use C2O?

Eliminates manual alignment work and saves time.

Keeps designs structured and easy to navigate.

Improves team collaboration by maintaining a clean layout.

Click ‚ÄúTry it out‚Äù and bring order to your Figma files effortlessly! üöÄ
plugins.tagline: Structure your Figma frames in One Click!

plugins.name: SmartTableFill
plugins.description:
SmartTableFill is a GPT-powered plugin designed for intelligent table population with contextual data. Unlike basic data fillers, SmartTableFill analyzes existing content to generate relevant entries, making it ideal for tasks like: creating email addresses based on user names, generating addresses aligned with specified cities, or calculating percentages based on given numbers.


Choose between basic and contextual modes to quickly populate tables for mockups, prototyping, and presentations. Customizable settings allow you to target specific text nodes, saving time on manual entry and bringing a smarter approach to data generation.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly populate tables with smart, contextual data using GPT
